FlowDefinition.description: "This flow is on lead object which will triggered when it is updated. 2. It will check if 1st Disqualified Reason is true then it will update the X1st_Disqualified_Reason1__c field of lead with Disqualified_Reason__c . And update the same for the 2nd 3rd 4th and 5th disqualifued reason field ."
